content: growveralls by psychiaknits version 1 2 august 2025 these baby overalls are very stretchy the all-over ribbing may take a bit more time to knit but it gives the fabric extra comfort and flexibility they are worked top-down which means you can easily add some length to the legs as needed when your baby grows size fits most babies from 6 12 months approx eu size 80 materials yarn kartopu ak-soft or any comparable dk yarn suitable for 5mm us 8 needles 2 skeins note i recommend using a yarn that is typically knit on 5 mm us 8 needles even though the pattern calls for 4 mm us 6 needles this ensures a dense enough fabric that still stretches well approximately 350 yards /320 meters needles 4mm us 6 circular needles or needle size needed to match gauge optional dpns size 4mm us 6 three stitch holders or scrap yarn two buttons diameter 2cm tapestry needle stitch markers gauge after blocking 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches in stockinette stitch on 4mm us 6 needles gauge in stockinette stitch 20 stitches and 30 row gauge in ribbing k1p1 32 stitches and 27 row abbreviations beg - beginning bobble - bind off / cast off cm - centimetre s co - cast on cont - continue g - gram s in - inch es k - knit k2tog - knit 2 together right-slanting decrease kfb - knit into front then back of stitch one-stitch increase m1l - make one left m1r - make one right p - purl pfb - purl into the front and back of stitch one-stitch increase pm = place marker rs - right side sm = slip marker st s - stitch es st st - stockinette stitch = knit on rs and purl on ws ws - wrong side yo - yarn over finished measurements adjustable leg length up to 30 cm inseam straps approx 25 cm chest circumference very stretchy due to ribbing approx 40 50 cm unstretched pattern straps make 2 co 5 sts work in garter stitch knit all row for 45 row or until the strap measures 25 cm place stitches on a holder join place both straps 10 stitches total on one needle knit two row across all stitches then continue with the back flap row 1 rs k5 m1l k5 11 sts row 2 ws and all even row k5 p to last 5 sts k5 row 3 5 7 9 11 13 15 17 k5 m1l k to last 5 sts m1r k5 27 stitches total - place on a stitch holder front flap co 29 stitches knit 2 row next row buttonhole row k2 yo k2tog k21 k2tog yo k2 knit 5 row now increase on the front flap rs k5 m1l knit to last 5 sts m1r k5 ws k5 purl to last 5 sts k5 repeat these two row until you have 59 stitches total body joining you now have 27 sts back
